verses.name: 1 Samuel 18:22
verses.text: And Saul commanded his servants, saying, Commune with David secretly, and say, Behold, the king hath delight in thee, and all his servants love thee: now therefore be the king’s son in law.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 18:23
verses.text: And Saul’s servants spake those words in the ears of David. And David said, Seemeth it to you a light thing to be a king’s son in law, seeing that I am a poor man, and lightly esteemed?

verses.name: 1 Samuel 18:24
verses.text: And the servants of Saul told him, saying, On this manner spake David.
